articles.title: Apollo group asteroid set to pass Earth by just 622,000 km, reveals NASA! Know how big it is - HT Tech
articles.description: An Apollo asteroid is predicted to pass Earth at its closest distance in orbit today, March 14. From size, speed to distance of approach, know all about the asteroid.

articles.title: Byju's Must Freeze $533 Million, Says US Bankruptcy Judge In Win For Lenders - NDTV
articles.description: Tech firm Think & Learn Pvt must freeze $533 million to protect the money for disgruntled lenders who claim the cash should only be used to pay them, a US judge said on Thursday.
articles.content:
